entry.string: Create Points: Points awarded for the creation of an item of this type
Delete Points: Points subtracted for the deletion of an item of this type (Don't use a negative value)
Display Points: Points awarded for viewing an item of this type
Update Points: Points awarded for updating an item of this type
Frontpage Points: Extra points awarded to items of this type that make it to frontpage status (Only applicable to the articles module)
The points are of type xxxx.xx .That means you can award/subtract from 0.00 up to 9999.99 for an item.
